title: Shift + Enter doesn't open all chat
body: Usually when I press shift + enter it would open all chat but recently had uninstalled and reinstalled league of legends and now when I press shift + enter it will just open team chat, although when I press shift + enter on the numpad it will open all chat, this effect happens in both normal league of legends and PBE so it couldn't be that some file was corrupted during installation. Please help I never realized how much I used this hotkey.

replies.body:
I just tested it and was able to use /All chat through the normal enter key as well as the numpad.  I'm not sure what might be causing this for you, but instinctively it does sound like your config files are acting wonky and not interacting with the server.  This could cause your bindings to not work properly on live or PBE clients since it's saved server side.  As a first step, I recommend resetting your config files to be sure:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if that works out for you!
Hey, I just tried this, still no luck thanks for the recommendation though.
Thanks for the update!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will look into this with you.  We'll respond as soon as possible!

Ill give it a go thanks for the recommendation.

EDIT: Wouldn't this just give me the text: "You can't change "config" while League of Legends is opened"?
